computer_extension_attribute.name: 800-53r5_moderate - sysprefs_internet_accounts_prefpane_disable
computer_extension_attribute.description:
The Internet Accounts System Preference pane _MUST_ be disabled to prevent the addition of unauthorized internet accounts.
[IMPORTANT] ==== Some organizations may allow the use and configuration of the built-in Mail.app, Calendar.app, and Contacts.app for organizational communication. Information System Security Officers (ISSOs) may make the risk-based decision not to disable the Internet Accounts System Preference pane to avoid losing this functionality, but they are advised to first fully weigh the potential risks posed to their organization. ====

input_type.script:
#!/bin/zsh #####----- Rule: sysprefs_internet_accounts_prefpane_disable -----##### ## Addresses the following NIST 800-53 controls: # * AC-20 # * CM-7(5) rule_arch="" plb="/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy" # setup files audit_plist_managed="/Library/Managed Preferences/org.800-53r5_moderate.audit.plist"
if [[ ! -e "$audit_plist_managed" ]];then audit_plist_managed="/Library/Preferences/org.800-53r5_moderate.audit.plist" fi
audit_plist="/Library/Preferences/org.800-53r5_moderate.audit.plist" audit_log="/Library/Logs/800-53r5_moderate_baseline.log" if [[ "$arch" == "$rule_arch" ]] || [[ -z "$rule_arch" ]]; then #echo 'Running the command to check the settings for: sysprefs_internet_accounts_prefpane_disable ...' unset result_value result_value=$(/usr/bin/profiles show -output stdout-xml | /usr/bin/xmllint --xpath 'string(//*[contains(text(), "DisabledPreferencePanes")]/following-sibling::*[1])' - | /usr/bin/grep -c com.apple.preferences.internetaccounts) # expected result {'integer': 1}
# check to see if rule is exempt unset exempt unset exempt_reason exempt=$($plb -c "print sysprefs_internet_accounts_prefpane_disable:exempt" "$audit_plist_managed" 2>/dev/null) exempt_reason=$($plb -c "print sysprefs_internet_accounts_prefpane_disable:exempt_reason" "$audit_plist_managed" 2>/dev/null)
if [[ ! $exempt == "true" ]] || [[ -z $exempt ]];then if [[ $result_value == "1" ]]; then echo "<result>sysprefs_internet_accounts_prefpane_disable passed (Result: $result_value, Expected: "{'integer': 1}")</result>"
else echo "<result>sysprefs_internet_accounts_prefpane_disable failed (Result: $result_value, Expected: "{'integer': 1}")</result>"
fi elif [[ ! -z "$exempt_reason" ]];then echo "<result>sysprefs_internet_accounts_prefpane_disable has an exemption (Reason: "$exempt_reason")</result>"
/bin/sleep 1 fi else echo "<result>sysprefs_internet_accounts_prefpane_disable does not apply to this architechture</result>" fi
